name: Check Windows Defender Status
description: Find systems on which Windows Defender antivirus or antispyware are disabled.

pass.success: All scanned systems have Windows Defender antivirus and antispyware enabled.
pass.failure: need Windows Defender antivirus and/or antispyware to be enabled.

quest.explanation: Having Windows Defender antivirus or antispyware disabled makes these machines vulnerable to attacks.
